text:
e="preserve">The Eurovision Song Contest 2021 will be the 65th edition of the Eurovision Song Contest and will take place in the Netherlands's second largest city Rotterdam, after Duncan Laurence won for his country in South Holland, Netherlands in 2019.
Eurovision Song Contest 2020 was cancelled due to the COVID-19 pandemic and was replaced with a live TV show called.
Venue.
The contest will take place in Rotterdam Ahoy in Rotterdam,
Provisional list of participating countries.
The following countries have confirmed their intent to participate in the 2021 contest.
